fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.dpp.withPlugins.plugins

Class ProcessorPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.dpp.withPlugins.plugins.SinkPlugin
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.dpp.withPlugins.plugins.ProcessorPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptingPipelineDataI, PluginI, java.io.Serializable

    public class ProcessorPlugin
extends SinkPlugin
    The class ProcessorPlugin implements the functionalities that are required by components that act as processors in the data processing pipeline.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true

    Created on : 2022-06-03

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
